definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: The fake Botox is cheaper than the real thing.
sentences.chinese: 假的肉毒素比真的便宜。

sentences.english: Botulinum toxin A -induced masseter muscle atrophy and its histomorphological changes in rabbits;
sentences.chinese: 结论肉毒素A有肯定的诱导肌萎缩作用。

sentences.english: We have become skewed in our concept of ageing by the phenomenon of Botox.
sentences.chinese: 肉毒素的奇效让我们的衰老观念发生了扭曲。

sentences.english: Botox, the commercial name of botulinum toxin type A, is a neuro-toxin produced by Clostridium botulinum.
sentences.chinese: 肉毒素是A型肉毒杆菌的商业名称。

sentences.english: Allergic skin that can be injected botulinum toxin it?
sentences.chinese: 过敏性的皮肤可以注射肉毒素吗？

sentences.english: It is a little more powerful than a facial, but not as effective as Botox.
sentences.chinese: 它比美容更有效，但效果不如肉毒素。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of kreotoxin A in the treatment of facial spas and blepharospasm .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨A型肉毒素对面肌或眼睑痉挛的疗效。

sentences.english: Clinical application of botulinum toxin treatment should be strictly controlled.
sentences.chinese: 临床应用肉毒素治疗应该严格掌握适应证。

pinyin: rou4 du2 gan3 jun1 du2 su4

definition: non-surgical cosmetic procedure (injection of Botox, hyaluronic acid etc)
fluid loaded into a syringe for a hypodermic injection
abbr. for 微整形[wei1 zheng3 xing2]
